alert.note: Alert for Grand Forks; Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 9:01PM CDT until May 12 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota...Minnesota... Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Kittson, Walsh, Marshall and Pembina Counties. Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Kittson and Pembina Counties. Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Marshall, Polk, Walsh and Grand Forks Counties. Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Polk and Grand Forks Counties. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. .The Red River has crested at all sites except for Pembina and just north of Drayton. Moderate flooding will continue at Pembina and Drayton. Recessions in river levels are expected over the next seven days at Oslo, Grand Forks, and Fargo. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY, MAY 12... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at Oslo. * WHEN...Until Friday, May 12. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 32.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CDT Thursday was 33.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage next Thursday. - Flood stage is 26.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
